timeline.message: run keychain adding only on osx

Merge branch 'macsign' of github.com:JabRef/jabref into macsign

* 'macsign' of github.com:JabRef/jabref:
  Update deployment.yml

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to upgrade to 15?
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,14 +56,29 @@ jobs:
       - name: Set up JDK
         uses: actions/setup-java@v1
         with:
-          java-version: 14
+          java-version: 15-ea

timeline.bodyText: Start with capitalized: Setup (here and below)
timeline.author: tobiasdiez
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,14 +56,29 @@ jobs:
       - name: Set up JDK
         uses: actions/setup-java@v1
         with:
-          java-version: 14
+          java-version: 15-ea
       - name: Restore gradle cache
         uses: actions/cache@master
         with:
           path: ~/.gradle/caches
           key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('**/*.gradle*') }}
           restore-keys: |
             ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-
+      - name: setup OSX Keychain on OSX only

timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText:
This workaround is no longer need, it has been fixed in 15 and the workaround prevented the windows build under 15
#6748 (comment)
replies.author: Siedlerchr

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into macsign

* upstream/master:
  Improve handling of annotation processor in eclipse (#6749)
  New Crowdin updates (#6741)
  Bump appleboy/ssh-action from v0.1.2 to v0.1.3 (#6752)
  Bump WyriHaximus/github-action-wait-for-status from 0.1.0 to v1.1 (#6751)
  Squashed 'src/main/resources/csl-styles/' changes from 827b986621..d23a3abd79
change icon position in dmg setup
TODO: find out the corect parameters for the installer vars

udpate icons for mac
regenerate all icons

timeline.bodyText:
Why do we need to include this script? Is it because of the image position? If yes, then please change the img instead.
It's really ugly that one needs to copy-paste the installation scripts. In this way, we don't get the enhancments and fixes from the JDK. So if its possible, I would strongly advice not to copy paste them.
timeline.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText:
It's actually not an installation script, it's just a macro script to set the background image and the icon position in the dmg. I figured out that I don't need to modify the variables. So we can always easily include upstream fixes.
It's explicity meant for overriding https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/14/jpackage/override-jpackage-resources.html#GUID-62412365-821D-4736-A20D-70F2D47136D8
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: So what did you actually changed then?
replies.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText: I changed the window positions and the icon position, by moving the app and install folder position a few pixes down and to the right.
replies.author: Siedlerchr

replies.bodyText: That's what I meant. You can also keep them in the standard location, and change the background image instead to adapt to the these locations.
replies.author: tobiasdiez
